name: helper-tags
teaser: Quanta is providing you with a number of pre-defined, useful tags such as
author: admin
body:
Quanta is providing you with a number of pre-defined, useful tags such as [PHONE|showtag] and [EMAIL|showtag].

The output of [PHONE|showtag:+39123456778] is:

[PHONE|id=phonenum|class=phone:+39123456778]
title: Helper tags
